title: Create Range Array
description: Generate an array of numbers within a specified range
instructions:
Write a function `range(start, end)` that creates an array of numbers from start to end (inclusive).

Example: range(1, 5) should return [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
Example: range(3, 7) should return [3, 4, 5, 6, 7]

hints.content: Create an empty array and use a loop to add each number from start to end.
Loop from start to end (inclusive) and push each number to your result array. Make sure to use <= for the end condition to include the end number.
Use `const result = [];` then `for (let i = start; i <= end; i++)` and `result.push(i)`. Return result.
